pureGlow.name: Classic Facial Cleaning
pureGlow.description: The classic facial cleaning is the foundation for healthy, radiant skin. It removes impurities and dead cells, allowing your skin to breathe. We use professional CNC Cosmetic products throughout.

basicCare.title: Fresh Clean – Basic Care
basicCare.description: Thorough cleansing and freshness for everyday life—ultrasonic skin scrubber, gentle peel, soothing mask and finishing care.

intensiveRelaxing.title: Glow Balance Intensive & Relaxing
intensiveRelaxing.description: Deep cleansing plus wellness: ultrasonic scrubber, enzymatic peel, nutrient ampoule, relaxing face & décolleté massage, light therapy, finishing mask.

aquafacial.name: Aquafacial
aquafacial.tagline: Intensive hydration, skin tightening, increase elasticity
paragraph: Aquafacial is a gentle, non-invasive facial treatment that combines skin cleansing, hydration, and care all in one. Using the power of water, vacuum, and nourishing serums, dead skin cells, sebum, and impurities are gently removed—without aggressive peels or mechanical irritation.

The special feature: During the treatment, the skin is not only deeply cleansed but also intensively supplied with moisture and valuable nutrients. An additional light therapy supports regeneration and makes the complexion glow.
The result: Instantly visibly fresher, smoother, and more radiant skin—ideal for all skin types, especially tired, impure, or dehydrated skin.
aquafacial.result: The result: Instantly visibly fresher, smoother, and more radiant skin—ideal for all skin types, especially tired, impure, or dehydrated skin.

microneedling.name: Microneedling Pro (CNC)
paragraph: Discover the power of innovative skin regeneration with Micro Needling PRO – the effective anti-aging technology from CNC Cosmetic. Noticeably firm, rejuvenate, and revitalize your skin – completely without surgical intervention.

Through targeted stimulation, the natural production of collagen, elastin, and hyaluronic acid is activated. The result: A finer, smoother, and more youthful complexion – with immediate effect and lasting results.
